name: Finesweeper
description:
Introducing Finesweeper: The finest Minesweeper in the world!

Bold claims call for bold text, so:

More realistically, Finesweeper aims to create a more relaxed and modern Minesweeper experience.

Different themes - Finesweeper lets you play with 5 unique themes that change the game's look and feel entirely, and make your experience more enjoyable :)

Dark mode - Yes! You can enable dark mode on any theme for a more eye-relaxing mine-sweeping session.

Animated tiles - Everytime you click to open a tile, you'll be pleased to see that it has a natural animation.

Sound effects - Did you know that sweeping mines is a lot more fun with sound? Wel I just found out and I think you'll love it too!
